np , just mount iso to some folder  for example : open terminal (ALT+F2 in gnome), create dir by typing in terminal ; sudo mkdir /mnt/ubuntu , then mount iso to that folder :  sudo mount -o loop YOUR-ISO-FILE-AND-PATH  /mnt/ubuntu . then open synaptic  and add /mnt/ubuntu as CD ROM source
thanx
